name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: One of the candidates at the early GOP debate, George Pataki, said his routine before every debate is to drink a diet lemon Snapple iced tea and pray. Which is also the advice Chris Christie gets from his doctor.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: A clothing company is making T-shirts inspired by Bernie Sanders with messages like “Feel the Bern.” They were gonna make them for Lincoln Chafee too, but no one wants to wear a shirt that says “Feel the Chafee.”

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: At a recent education summit, President Obama admitted that he can’t rap. When they heard, Americans said, “Good!”

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: According to a new survey, about half of the world thinks kissing is gross. That half is known as "married people."
